name: Lemon
properties: Lemons contain citrate, which is a chemical that prevents calcium stones from forming. Citrate can also break up small stones, allowing them to pass more easily.

name: Basil
properties: Basil juice contains acetic acid, which helps to break down the kidney stones and reduce pain. It is full of nutrients. This remedy has been used traditionally for digestive and inflammatory disorders.

name: Dandelion Root
properties: Dandelion root is a kidney tonic that stimulates the production of bile. This is thought to help eliminate waste, increase urine output, and improve digestion. Dandelions have vitamins (A, B, C, D) and minerals such as potassium, iron, and zinc.

name: Celery
properties: It clears away toxins that contribute to kidney stone formation. It also helps flush out the body of the toxins so you can pass the stone. Celery juice is great urine producers and kidney tonics.

name: Pomegranate
properties: It not only lowers urine acidity but also reduces the risk of future kidney stones. Pomegranate juice also acts as a natural detoxifying agent.
